name: Funny Hotel
description:
A short and weird game about exploring a very unfunny hotel.

The Funny Hotel is an experiment in creating a surreal aesthetic using my own hand drawn sprites, some fun shaders, and weird dialogue.

In total, it should take around 5-10 minutes to play. 

If you like short, strange, and experimental games, then give it a shot!

Use the W-A-S-D keys or the arrow keys to move around. Use the left-mouse button to interact.
